TEXT.TITLE: ALLIED BANKSHARES <ALBN> SHARE OFFER EFFECTIVE
TEXT.BODY: Allied Bankshares Inc said its registration statement covering a 500,000 share offering was declared effective. The company said the stock will be sold at 12.50 dlrs a share through an offering underwritten by Johnson Lane Space Smith and Co Inc and Interstate Securities Corp. Reuter
